headline: Systems Engineer
summary:
William Richard offers 20+ years of experience in multiple environments as a systems engineer.  He has expertise in infrastructure enhancement across the enterprise. He has collaborated with cross-functional teams, diagnosed complex problems and improved system performance.   While his experience is primarily in government requiring security clearance, his experience is not limited to that area.  If you are looking for an IT professional who can analyze system requirements, create technology plans and oversee the complex implementation process to usher in a superior level of performance.

Specialties: Active Directory Management, AWS Architecture, Data Center Migration, Server Deployment, Server Hardening, Web Hosting Infrastructure Support, DevOps

positions.description:
Successfully migrated enterprise web application hosting environments from existing data centers to new facilities while maintaining high availability of hosted applications and providing leadership to 3-person team.

Provided leadership and active participation during the planning and execution of relocating the enterprise web application hosting environments.  Extended schema of Active Directory domains to support 2008 architecture; planned and executed extension of domain to include new physical sites; planned and executed decommissioning of preexisting sites and domain controllers.  Planned, installed, and configured deployable Windows Server 2003 and 2008 operating system images that were used by remote Data Center personnel to build 200+ Windows servers. 
* Provided oversight to Data Center Decommissioning activities performed by other contractors including inventory reconciliation and secure, controlled destruction of sensitive data on storage devices and media
* Perform server like-for-like migration from existing physical platforms to remote physical platforms located in remote data center
* Installed and configured web hosting applications including IIS and Oracle Application Server clients
* Planning, coordination, and execution of physical lab environment move from local contractor facility to local government facility
* Planning, coordination, and maintenance of Storage Area Network (SAN) resources with remote storage engineering team
* Planning, coordination, and execution of firewall requirements
Technologies and environments supported: Windows Server 2003 and Windows Server 2008 R2, web and application servers; CX3-20, CX3-40 SAN technologies; Brocade Silkworm 4100 and 4500 Fiber Switches; System Administration of the web farm Windows 2003 Active Directory domain; Cluster Services (MSCS) for multiple projects; SQL Server 2005/2008 installation and configuration, including failover clusters; VMWare ESXi 4.1
positions.title: Sr. System Administrator

positions.description:
Create Active Directory Group Policy Objects (GPOs) in accordance to industry standards while performing Active Directory user maintenance and overseeing server backup maintenance with Symantec Backup Exec System Recovery.  Maintain up-to-date remote contingency environment combined with disaster recovery fallback for all mission critical systems and basic network support.  Collaborate with cross-functional teams to provide physical and logical server and OS security and optimize system performance. Create and configure web sites and virtual directories.
 	Respond to support calls and mid-tier infrastructure monitoring alert pages
 	Deploy custom SharePoint solutions provided by a development team while maintaining  systems and logical environment documentation
 	Perform IIS directory security, adding and editing application mapping extensions, configuring Resin ISAPI filter for Java web applications, creating and configuring application pools, and managing web service extensions
 	Utilize Net IQ monitoring software and Dell OpenManage software to resolve network, security, application, OS, and hardware related issues
 	Creation, planning and maintenance of Storage Area Network (SAN) resources
